keywordhandler.add.usage.message: Usage: !keyword add [flags] [keyword] [response]. Flags can by empty or any combination of "--regex", "--case-sensitive".

keywordhandler.cooldown.removed.message: Cooldown for keyword $1 has been removed.

keywordhandler.cooldown.set.message: Cooldown for keyword $1 has been set to $2 seconds.

keywordhandler.cooldown.usage.message: Usage: !keyword cooldown [keyword] [seconds] - Use -1 to remove a cooldown.
